title: Jellyfish Necklace
summaries: The Jellyfish Necklace is an accessory which has a 1*1/100 (1%) chance to drop from Pink, Blue, or Green Jellyfish in the Ocean and Underground or Cavern layer. In the [img:Old-gen console version] Old-gen console version, Nintendo 3DS[img:Nintendo 3DS version] version, and [img:Legacy tModLoader version] Legacy tModLoader version, the Jellyfish Necklace provides a faint pink glow when the player is submerged in water or honey. In the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, this glow is also provided out of liquids and its brightness is significantly increased when submerged.

statistics.Tooltip:
Generates a very subtle glow which becomes more vibrant underwater
Provides light under water
statistics.Sell: 1
